description: Complete system overview covering the agent hub architecture, key components, and high-level interaction patterns between agents, memory system, and Google integrations
Detailed documentation of the agent system architecture, including agent types, handoff mechanisms, tool integration patterns, and the triage system for routing requests
Comprehensive documentation of the memory system, including embedding generation, LanceDB integration, semantic search algorithms, and conversation storage/retrieval mechanisms
Detailed documentation of Google service integrations, covering OAuth implementation, credential management, and the implementation of Gmail and Calendar tools
Documentation of data flow patterns between components, including agent communication, memory system interactions, and integration with external services
